action.msg: Hey, hey! You're a lotta fun to play with than I thought you'd be! But...
I think it's time to get a bit more serious. . .
Would be a nice change of pace!
Gotta say, I'm more happy harmonizing with you than other people.
Most people would've threatened me instantly. That or curse me out-
Though, your whole work vibe is still SUPER boring.
Can’t agree. I’d say I've been having a lot of fun~.
Pffft, you're lame.
Oh, I know. I’ve watched you two.
Well, obviously I needed some pics for my smear campaign.
Remember? The peep hole?
That’s an invasion of privacy!
You guys didn't seem to hate it too much.
I'm gonna beat your ass if you don't shut up and start singing.
You guys don't know how much I'm loving your expressions right now.
You can’t embarrass us anymore than how you’ve humiliated yourself today!
I don’t see this as humiliating!
Yeah? Well, how about fall off a cliff, you stupid fu-
Ow. Ow, shouldn’t do that too fast
Was wondering when that’d show up.
Huh? What was that?
Do you really care? I’m just gonna beat you and kick you out.
Just start the next song, Tea!
Interesting . . .
